Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Grand Hotel Miramare in Taormina, you'll be minutes from Greek Theatre and Parco Duca di Cesaro. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Taormina Cable Car and Villa Comunale Garden.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 67 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have bidets and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and blackout drapes/curtains, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities including an outdoor tennis court and a seasonal outdoor pool. Additional features at this Beaux Arts hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include limo/town car service, express check-in, and express check-out. A roundtrip airport shuttle is available for a surcharge.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2:30 PM Check-out time is 10:30 AM
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is included.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Grand Hotel Miramare in Taormina, you'll be minutes from Greek Theatre and Parco Duca di Cesaro. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Taormina Cable Car and Villa Comunale Garden.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Greek Theatre - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Parco Duca di Cesaro - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Taormina Cable Car - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Villa Comunale Garden - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
San Pancrazio Church - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Lido Mazzaro - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Porta Messina - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Palazzo dei Congressi - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Palazzo Corvaja - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Museum of Art and Popular Traditions - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Chiesa Santa Caterina - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Taormina Roman Odeon - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
San Giorgio Theatre - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Piazza IX April - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Church of San Giuseppe - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi

The preferred airport for Grand Hotel Miramare is Catania (CTA-Fontanarossa) - 47.1 km / 29.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Grand Hotel Miramare is Catania (CTA-Fontanarossa) - 47.1 km / 29.3 mi.
